title: YouTube testing AI-powered age verification in U.S.
description: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.

title: India Tycoon Partners US Firm on $2 AI Email Rival to Outlook
description: Indian tech entrepreneur Bhavin Turakhia is partnering GoDaddy Inc. to offer his artificial intelligence-led email service — Titan — to tens of millions of new users in an enterprise market dominated by Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google.

title: AI-powered digital twins pave the way for precision healthcare
description: Artificial intelligence and machine learning serve as the analytical engines that interpret data inputs. The Internet of Things ensures seamless, continuous data acquisition from wearable devices, while cloud computing supports the storage and computational load required to manage patient models. Together, these components create a virtual platform where disease management can be personalized, proactive, and predictive.
content: A new review sheds critical light on how digital twin (DT) technology is poised to redefine the landscape of personalized medicine. The study explores the evolution, enabling technologies, real-world use cases, and ethical challenges associated with ... [6481 chars]

title: Age is no reason to fear workplace artificial intelligence
description: Kai Riemer and Sandra Peter explain how in the workplace older employees may have an advantage when it comes to optimising AI.
content:
Kai Riemer and Sandra Peter from the University of Sydney discuss how age can be an advantage not a deficit for AI adoption in the working environment.
